**Wikipedia summary**:  
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p>The <b>sooty grouse</b> (<i><b>Dendragapus fuliginosus</b></i>) is a species of forest-dwelling grouse native to North America's Pacific Coast Ranges. It is closely related to the dusky grouse (<i>Dendragapus obscurus</i>), and the two were previously considered a single species, the blue grouse.
